title: Bit form-Field Types
description: The field types of form builder are a form of user interface components that are used to create a form within a web page or an application. Field types are available by default in the form builder. The field types are available when you create a new form by choosing the Form builder option. There are many field types that can be used to create different types of online forms. The most popular types are the ones for user input, like text fields, checkboxes, radio buttons and select lists.

previous.title: How to create a WordPress form using BitForm
